channel.title: Looking Ahead on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Looking Ahead on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Meta Has Already Won the Smart Glasses Race
item.description: By securing a billion-dollar stake in the world’s largest eyewear maker with a massive retail footprint, Meta is building both a moat and a launchpad, leaving Google trailing and Apple way behind.
